flawed_nl_solution:
Jerry mows 8 acres x 3/4 = 32/3 acres with a riding mower.
It will take him 32/3 acres / 2 each hour = <<32/3/2=16/3>>16/3 hours.
Jerry mows 8 acres - 32/3 acres mowed with a riding mower = <<8-32/3=-8/3>>-8/3 acres with a push mower.
It will take him -8/3 acres x 1 hour = <<-8/3*1=-8/3>>-8/3 hours.
It takes Jerry a total of 16/3 hours on the riding mower + -8/3 hours on the push mower = <<16/3+-8/3=8/3>>8/3 hours.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 32/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
